title: Perfect Square
text: This equation is a perfect square

title: Factors
text: In this equation $${ax}^2+bx+c$$ the square root of a and c are $$7$$ and $$11$$ respectively.

title: Plug in
text: Plug into the perfect square simplified form $${\left(nx+m\right)}^2$$ where $$n$$ is the square root of a and $$m$$ is the square root of c
